messages.title: Labour Listening and Acting
messages.content: Labour government will guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours.

messages.title: Making Climate Change a top priority for the United Kingdom
messages.content: Labour Pledges to Act - The UK has some of the least energy-efficient homes in Europe. A Labour government would invest in making homes more energy-efficient, saving UK families an average of £270 from their heating bills.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours to address waiting times issues.
Addressing the shortage of school places locally; a new secondary school for Dulwich.
Labour will cut business rates for 35000 small businesses.
Labour will invest in making homes more energy-efficient and aim for the UK to be leading the world on climate change once again.
A new Health and Leisure Centre for West Norwood has been successfully negotiated by the local Labour team.
Lambeth Labour secured £36 million from the government to fund childcare hubs, giving a better start for Brixton babies.

issues.economy: Labour will cut business rates for 35000 small businesses. Labour will invest in green technologies, creating more than one job every 20 minutes in the renewable energy sector.
issues.education: More school places needed in Dulwich and West Norwood. Helen Hayes has welcomed the announcement by the Department of Education that Dulwich will get a new secondary school.
issues.environment: Labour will make climate change a top priority and invest in making homes more energy-efficient.
issues.health: A Labour government will guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours.

housing.content: Labour will invest in making homes more energy-efficient, saving UK families an average of £270 from their heating bills.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Party 264 Rosendale Road London SE24 9DL

endorsements.endorsement: Helen is campaigning to tackle the shortage of school places locally
Helen will fight tirelessly to tackle the housing shortage
Helen is a hard working local councillor and will make a great MP.
Helen is the only candidate who is serious about climate change.

images.caption: Helen Hayes and Tessa Jowell at King's College Hospital.
